title: Sport Font
content: I am looking for a font that resembles the Gatorade drink font? Any takers
author: John First

comments.content:
One that resembles it is House's [Bullet](http://web.archive.org/web/20100723105617/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=8&subpage=viewfonts). The G doesn't close the same, but the effect is similar.

- Mike Yanega

An even closer font is [Kit Condensed Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20100723105617/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/kit_condensed_italic/?sample_text=Gatorade). I think 'close' is probably the most to expect, as I think the logo is custom, as most logos are.

- Mike Yanega
Thank you for your help, those are great
